name: Invite the blackbird (ana.merzlaya, Alios)
description:
Invite The Blackbird is a hand-drawn watercolour 2d game made in a form of comics. Follow the heart-warming story about Sonya and the blackbird. As the story unfolds, few point-and-click puzzles will be on your way.

Controllers: up/down to move the camera view; mouse click to interact/open the next pad

Credits:

  • Created by: Anastasia Merzlaya
  • Music & Sfx & audio implementation: Alios

P.S.   If you enjoyed the game you might also check Sonya's other adventures: https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/trust-the-blackbird
https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/follow-the-blackbird
https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/sleep-the-blackbird
